title: Implement sparse case optimisation
body:
Implement sparse case optimisation: remove case alternatives for tags that HPT proves can never appear at the scrutinee.

**Deliverables:**
- Analyse each `case` expression: which tags can the scrutinee actually have? (from HPT)
- Remove alternatives for impossible tags
- If only one alternative remains, replace `case` with the alternative body (with appropriate bindings)
- Unit tests

**Design notes:**
- Often combined with evaluated case elimination
- Reduces code size and can enable further optimisations
